question: Which Indian state/UT launched a new mobile application named ‘E-Gyan Mitra’?
option3: Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu
answer: Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu
explanation:
The Union Territory of Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu has launched a new mobile application named ‘E-Gyan Mitra’.
The application launched by the Education Department of the UT aims to teach the students through digital mode. Students from Primary to Higher secondary classes can take online classes and attend tests in the application.
